title: S16 Ep108: The Curse of Lizzie Borden w/Chris Fleming & Sam Baltrusis
itunes:title: The Curse of Lizzie Borden w/Chris Fleming & Sam Baltrusis
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Curse of Lizzie Borden with Chris Fleming & Sam Baltrusis

Dave welcomes his co-stars from the new Discovery+ Shock Doc, The Curse of Lizzie Borden to talk about the history and haunting of this infamous story. The team opens up about the investigation, the ramifications of what they uncovered and experienced and the long term effects of what they encountered.

During this investigation the team is confronted with new challenges, fears and experiences they will never forget.

Visit Chris Fleming here: www.ChristopherFleming.com

Visit Sam Baltrusis here: www.SamBaltrusis.com

To see the pics of the automatic writing visit: https://www.darknessradio.com/news
